comment: /**  * Add a {@link ClassFileTransformer} to be applied by this ClassLoader.  * @param transformer the {@link ClassFileTransformer} to register  */
code: /**  * Add a {@link ClassFileTransformer} to be applied by this ClassLoader.  * @param transformer the {@link ClassFileTransformer} to register  */ public void addTransformer(ClassFileTransformer transformer) {     this.weavingTransformer.addTransformer(transformer). }
@Override protected byte[] transformIfNecessary(String name, byte[] bytes) {     return this.weavingTransformer.transformIfNecessary(name, bytes). }
